scripts.prebuild: node ../../preBuild && yarn type & yarn typeSrc & yarn eslint & yarn eslintSrc && rimraf ./dist ./types && yarn buildTypes
scripts.build:next: cross-env NODE_TAG=next babel ./src/lib --out-dir ./dist/next/lib  --extensions ".ts,.tsx" && cross-env NODE_TAG=next rollup -c
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_TAG=esm babel ./src/lib --out-dir ./dist/esm/lib  --extensions ".ts,.tsx" && cross-env NODE_TAG=esm rollup -c
scripts.build: yarn build:next && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
scripts.docs-md: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown  --out api src/index.tsx --hideSources --theme markdown && node fixDocs
